page.content: Doctor Finder Home Patient center Find a doctor Welcome to SIR's Doctor Finder. Doctor Finder is the most comprehensive database of interventional radiologists practicing in the United States and internationally. Use the search fields on the left side of the screen to search based on geographic location or by state or country. If you already know the name of an IR in your area, you can enter their last name. Doctor Finder only includes information on those practicing interventional radiologists who are SIR members. SIR has created this Doctor Finder as a public service to provide access to information on interventional radiologists who are members of SIR. Neither the database, nor any part of the data, listings, profiles, or other constituent elements may be downloaded, republished, or duplicated, in whole or in part, for commercial purposes, purposes of compiling a mailing list or any other list of interventional radiologists, or for any other purposes without the prior express written permission of SIR. Want to know more? Have questions about interventional radiology? SIR provides Doctor Finder information of its members as a public service. Doctor Finder is intended to provide the public with quick access to information on interventional radiologists who are members of SIR. Neither the database, nor any part of the data, listings, profiles, or other constituent elements may be downloaded, republished, or duplicated, in whole or in part, for commercial purposes, purposes of compiling a mailing list or any other list of interventional radiologists, or for any other purposes without the prior express written permission of SIR. Although SIR makes reasonable efforts to keep the information in Doctor Finder up to date, SIR does not warrant and assumes no liability legal, financial or otherwise for the accuracy, currency nor completeness of this information contained here, the manner in which it is used, or the treatment provided by any physician included in the Doctor Finder database. This information is provided as a public service to patients. Any other use of this information without the express, written permission of SIR is strictly prohibited. In no event shall SIR be liable for any decision made or action taken in reliance on the information contained therein. This information is being provided for informational purposes only and should not be used as the sole means for selecting an interventional radiologist. Provision of this list of names, addresses and practice area(s) is not to be considered an endorsement by SIR of any physician on the list. Doctor Finder Doctor Finder
